title: Other uses in the Industries Zone (I-Zone): If a plot in the Industrial Zone (I-Zone) becomes un-bui
clause_text: Other uses in the Industries Zone (I-Zone): If a plot in the Industrial Zone (I-Zone) becomes un-buildable for industrial use because of restrictions in the Industrial Location Policy of GoM or restrictions regarding segregating distances under these Regulations, the following uses may be permitted on such plot without maintaining the required segregation distances: Offices for public utility concerns or organizations
